name: edX Online Course Data
special_instructions: The input of this tool should be JSON containing the list of pages on edx that should be visited.
The 'search' field is optional and is used to search for a specific keyword in the courses.
The 'language' field is optional and is used to filter the results by the course language.
The 'maxItems' field is optional and is used to limit the number of scraped items. This should be useful when you search through big lists or search results.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
